actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title VII of the Tariff Act of 1930 to include interim processors within industries producing processed agricultural products, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to include interim processors within industries producing processed agricultural products. Prohibits the United States International Trade Commission, in making certain determinations of material injury, from considering the relative overall health of the domestic industry to be dispositive of the issue of material injury or the threat thereof, but allows the consideration of the relative health of such industry only in the context of import impact.

titles.title: A bill to amend title VII of the Tariff Act of 1930 to include interim processors within industries producing processed agricultural products, and for other purposes.
